title: What happens if i have a default?
question: Credit card debt can they put a lien on my mobile for 2000 dollars
answers: Yes, if the creditor obtains a judgment they can put a lien against any/all property you have. If you are in such a situation, you would benefit from speaking to a bankruptcy attorney to see if you qualify to eliminate the debt.
